Module scenebuilder.core
Package com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.core.ui

Class AbstractWindowController

java.lang.Object
com.oracle.javafx.scenebuilder.core.ui.AbstractWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
SceneBuilderWindow
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractFxmlWindowController, PreviewWindowController
public abstract class AbstractWindowController
extends Object
implements SceneBuilderWindow

    • AbstractWindowController

      public AbstractWindowController​(Api api, SceneBuilderWindow owner)
      Instantiates a new abstract window controller.

      owner - the owner

  • Method Details

    • setRoot

      public void setRoot​(javafx.scene.Parent root)
      Set the root of this panel controller. This routine must be invoked by subclass's makePanel() routine.
      Parameters:
      root - the root panel (non null).

    • getRoot

      public javafx.scene.Parent getRoot()
      Returns the root FX object of this window.
      Returns:
      the root object of this window (never null)

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      Returns the scene of this window. This method invokes getRoot(). When called the first time, it also invokes controllerDidCreateScene() just after creating the scene object.
      Returns:
      the scene object of this window (never null)

    • getStage

      public javafx.stage.Stage getStage​(boolean renew)
      Returns the stage of this window. This method invokes getScene(). When called the first time, it also invokes controllerDidCreateStage() just after creating the stage object.
      Returns:
      the stage object of this window (never null).

      Specified by:

    • toolStylesheetDidChange

      protected void toolStylesheetDidChange​(StylesheetProvider newToolStylesheetConfig)
      Replaces old Stylesheet config by the tool style sheet assigned to this controller. This methods is event binded to DocumentManager.stylesheetConfig() using an RxJava2 subscription.
      Parameters:
      newToolStylesheetConfig - null or the new style sheet configuration to apply

      Clamp window.
